name: Other Me
description:
• Oliver Lambreghts - oliver.lambreghts@student.howest.be
  • Luka Verhelle - luka.verhelle@hotmail.com
  • Tom Stevens  - tomstevens753@gmail.com
  • Gianni Walreat - gianni.walraet@gmail.com
  • Yvette Kooke - y.kooke@kpnmail.nl

You always had a feeling you're not alone. last time you checked you’re mirror you notice something strange... your surroundings looks different.. 

Other me is a Short Horror game made for the Unreal Game Jam 2022. 

Further About this project/game will be up to you. so tell us what you think and would like to see!

 

Two Worlds are connected, you can bring items through the mirror. Sometimes objects are different in the other world. did someone touch it?

Walk through the mirror to go see the other world. but you are not alone.
